Features

Big Mouth: Cannot keep secrets
Command: R10" Commanded gain +1 to recover from Shaken or Stunned
Driven+: Has overwhelming need to fulfill personal goal
Natural Leader: May apply leadership edges to Wild Cards
Wanted: Has trouble with distant law or minor infractions
